entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suboptimal codegen for Vector3 -> Vector128 conversion` #92671
    Future
  • Relax DynamicMethod to permit ref returns #92670
  • [QUIC] Authentication failed because the remote party sent a TLS alert 'UserCanceled' #92669
  • [Mono] Accessing the thread state of a resurrected Thread object asserts #92663
    9.0.0
  • Interop source generators failing build in dotnet/runtime when latest SDK is installed #92655
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RegisterNonGCSegment (custom NonGC heaps) #92650
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed #92649
  • [Test Failure] Http2_IncorrectServerPreface_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException #92647
  • [API Proposal]: Deprecate non-generic collections #92640
  • Configuration-binding source generator: section children values aren't overridden by configuration #92638
  • `UnsafeAccessor` throws `MissingFieldException` on generic field (`T`) #92633
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonElement.TryGetDouble() succeeds when the value is not representable as a double #92631
  • dotnet publish with reference to `Microsoft.Data.SqlClient` 5.1.1 causes NETSDK1152 for Microsoft.Web. WebView2.Core.dll #92676
  • [Feature Request]: Add synchronous gauge instrument #92625
    9.0.0
  • WhenDiskIsFullTheErrorMessageContainsAllDetails fails for large disks #92624
  • CreateCertificate_MicrosoftPlatformCryptoProvider_EcdsaKey fails with The requested operation is not supported #92623
  • MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_Loopback_Succeeds doesn't #92622
  • Using null conditional in if statement comparisons has bad performance #92620
  • .NET SDK 7.0.401 and msquic 2.2.0 break HTTP/3 on Linux #92617
  • Deoptimization returns different versions of code when R2R is used #92616
    8.0.0

Closed

  • 📢dotnet/runtime schedule for the remainder of .NET 7 #72297
    Future
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to System.Diagnostics.Metrics's Meter and Instruments #87758
    Future
  • Write barrier elision on object reference assignment to a return buffer? #92662
  • Property on custom attribute not returned when attribute uses inheritance [.NET Framework] #92565
    Future
  • Unable to run tests in libraries #92652
  • Configuration provider does not deserialize Dictionary<int, T> correctly. #92609
    Future
  • `NullabilityInfoContext` reporting incorrect nullability for `ParameterInfo` of generic types #92487
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209.cmd #92572
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Multiply/MultiplyLongOps/MultiplyLongOps.cmd #92571
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of `object` scheme #76062
    9.0.0
  • Compiler overwrites wrong memory location in .NET 8 RC1 when using Unsafe.Add and Vector256<uint>[0] #92590
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 7/23/2023 6:20:38 PM #91361
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ReadAllLinesEnumerable method #92636
  • System.Text.Json can't deserialize nested records inside class #92629
  • [API Proposal]: Use [RuntimeDirectivesAttribute] to mark RuntimeDirectives Types when use reflection in aot. #92593

PullRequests

Created

  • Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92679
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix arm64 fragment unwinding #92678
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert SpinWait to QCall #92675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move more sprintf usages to snprintf #92674
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable SIMD intrinsics on winx64. #92673
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update TensorPrimitives.CosineSimilarity to vectorize handling of remaining elements #92672
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92668
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] GetChromeVersions: Fix fetching v8 version given a chrome version #92667
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make it possible to preinitialize HW intrinsic IsSupported #92666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #92665
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change how test assemblies opt-in to LibraryImportGenerator usage #92661
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Enable all interop generators if any are enabled #92660
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, dev-innerloop
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add tests for `UnsafeAccessor` on fields on generic types #92657
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle () for llvm on x64. #92656
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Binder gen incremental final #92654
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: Handle remainder accesses more precisely in physical promotion liveness #92651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use P256 for PCP X.509 test #92646
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: [mono][tests] Enable trimming for libraries and functional tests on CI #92645
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92627
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update the Windows ARM64 unwinder #92604
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add net8 wasi workload tests #92653
    area-Workloads, os-wasi
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Meter and Instruments #91496
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • fixed the order of WASI_AFTER_RUNTIME_LOADED_CALLS #92552
    community-contribution, os-wasi, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove CallArgABIInformation::IsStruct #92635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDump improvements and other minor cleanup #92510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add link to a known issue on Android-Bionic #92632
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Minor code cleanup in TensorPrimitives tests #92575
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Fix containment of extract intrinsics as STOREIND sources #92634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test exclusion for Runtime_91209 #92613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure HW intrinsics enabled when running arm64 longmul tests. #92607
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92630
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Unaligned read/write only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasi] Fix wasi.build.test instructions #92614
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Split off patched code into separate .S file and disable subsections-via-symbols for it #92555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • [browser] WASM sidecar - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add illink analyzer support for field/property initializers #92600
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Doc fix-ups to InstrumentRule #92035
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo*/Extract* #92513
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] WASM deputy worker - multi-threading proposal #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
